original_text: Thus you shall do to all the cities that are very far from you, which are not cities of the nations here.
korean_text: 네가 네게서 멀리 떠난 성읍들 곧 이 민족들에게 속하지 아니한 성읍들에게는 이같이 행하려니와

sentences.original_text: Thus you shall do to all the cities
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너는 모든 성읍에게 이렇게 행하라

sentences.original_text: that are very far from you
which are not cities of the nations here
